src:
Babak I: Real Madrid Unggul Telak 4-0 atas Galatasaray
07 Nov 2019, 03:49 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Rodrygo. (AP Photo/Bernat Armangue)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Real Madrid untuk sementara unggul 4-0 Galatasaray pada lanjutan Liga Champions di Stadion Santiago Bernabeu, Kamis (7/11) dini hari WIB.Los Blancos mendapat angin segar di menit-menit awal melalui gol cepat Rodyrgo. Talenta muda asal Brasil itu memborong dua gol saat laga baru berjalan tujuh menit.Gol pertama Rodrygo tercipta berkat aksi individu menawan pada menit ketiga. Menerima umpan silang dari Marcelo di kotak penalti, Rodrygo lebih dulu mengecoh dua pemain lawan sebelum menceploskan bola ke pojok kanan gawang.Empat menit berselang, Rodrygo kembali membuat publik Bernabeu bergemuruh. Kali ini, penyerang berusia 18 tahun itu mencetak gol kedua melalui sundulan. Dua gol Rodrygo tercipta berkat assist Marcelo.Tujuh menit kemudian, Sergio Ramos memperlebar keunggulan Madrid menjadi 3-0 lewat eksekusi penalti. Wasit menunjuk titik putih setelah Toni Kroos dijegal Steven Nzonzi.Unggul tiga gol membuat Madrid sedikit menurunkan tempo sehingga pertandingan kurang menggigit dan cenderung membosankan. Terlebih Galatasaray kesulitan menembus pertahanan El Real.Casemiro hampir membawa Madrid unggul 4-0 di menit ke-39. Sayang sundulannya memanfaatkan umpan tendangan bebas dianulir karena offside.Los Blancos semakin berada di atas angin setelah Karim Benzema menecetak gol tambahan di menit ke-45. Striker asal Prancis itu dengan mudah meneruskan umpan silang mendatar Rodrygo yang tampil impresif.Skor 4-0 untuk keunggulan Madrid bertahan hingga jeda pertandingan.Susunan pemain Real Madrid vs Galatasaray:Real Madrid XI (4-3-3): Thibaut Courtois; Daniel Carvajal, Raphael Varane, Sergio Ramos, Marcelo; Toni Kroos, Casemiro, Federico Valverde; Rodrygo, Karim Benzema, Eden Hazard.Galatasaray XI (4-3-3): Fernando Muslera; Mariano, Christian Luyindama, Marcao, Yuto Nagatomo; Jean Michael Seri, Steven Nzonzi, Mario Lemina; Ryan Babel, Florin Andone, Sofiane Feghouli. (jun)
text:
Leg I: Real Madrid win a landslide 4-0 victory over Galatasaray
Nov 7 2019, 03:49 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Rodrygo. (AP Photo / Bernat Armangue)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Real Madrid temporarily ahead 4-0 Galatasaray in the Champions League continued at the Santiago Bernabeu Stadium on Thursday (7/11) early morning local time. Las Blancos got a breath of fresh air in the early minutes through Rodyrgo's quick goal. The young Brazilian talent bought up two goals when the game has been running for seven minutes. Rodrygo's first goal was created thanks to the charming individual action in the third minute. Receiving a cross from Marcelo in the penalty box, Rodrygo first outwit two opposing players before struck the ball into the right corner of the goal. Four minutes later, Rodrygo again made the Bernabeu public rumble. This time, the 18-year-old striker scored the second goal with a header. Rodrygo's two goals were created thanks to Marcelo's assist. Seven minutes later, Sergio Ramos widened Madrid's lead to 3-0 with a penalty. The referee pointed to the spot after Toni Kroos was intercepted by Steven Nzonzi. The top three goals made Madrid slightly lower the tempo so the match was less biting and tended to be boring. Moreover Galatasaray difficulty penetrating the El Real defense. Casemiro almost brought Madrid winning 4-0 in the 39th minute. Unfortunately his header utilizes a free kick disallowed for offside. Los Blancos is getting the upper hand after Karim Benzema scored an additional goal in the 45th minute. The French striker easily continued with a horizontal cross from Rodrygo who appeared impressive. The 4-0 score for Madrid's advantage lasted until the break. Real Madrid vs Galatasaray players: Real Madrid XI (4-3-3): Thibaut Courtois; Daniel Carvajal, Raphael Varane, Sergio Ramos, Marcelo; Toni Kroos, Casemiro, Federico Valverde; Rodrygo, Karim Benzema, Eden Hazard. Galatasaray XI (4-3-3): Fernando Muslera; Mariano, Christian Luyindama, Marcao, Yuto Nagatomo; Jean Michael Seri, Steven Nzonzi, Mario Lemina; Ryan Babel, Florin Andone, Sofiane Feghouli. (jun)
